body.name: Elongated One Piece Toilet, 12" Rough-In, Compact Design for Bathrooms, 1.1/1.6 GPF Dual Flush toilet, MAP 1000g, Soft-Closing Seat, White Toilet Bowl - 27.75"D x 15.4"W x 27.13"H
features: Elongated & Space Saving Toilet: 18.75 inch elongated toilet seat provides ample seating space, enhancing user comfort. The compact design, measuring 27.75"D x 15.4"W x 27.13"H, makes the SOTOMO toilet an ideal choice for saving space in modern bathrooms.

MAP Score 1000 Grams: Experience superior flushing with the SOTOMO dual flush toilet. With the ability to clear up to 1000 grams (2.2 pounds) of solids in a single flush, coupled with robust siphon drainage and a fully-glazed 2" trapway, this toilet minimizes the risk of clogs.

User-Friendly Toilet Seat: The soft-close function allows you to enjoy silent nights, ensuring a disturbance-free experience for your family and also extends the lifespan of the toilet seat. The quick-release functionality makes installation and cleaning a breeze, promoting convenience in your daily routine.

Easy to Clean: With a fully glazed ceramic bowl fired at 2246°F, this compact elongated toilet is stain-resistant, reducing cleaning frequency. The skirted design's smooth sides simplify cleaning, eliminating nooks and crannies.
Siphon Jet Dual Flushing Toilet: Siphon ensures silent, efficient flushing. Choose between 1.1 and 1.6 GPF for personalized water usage, saving on water bills and resources.

Easy to Install: Two side-mounting holes ensure easy installation for this toilet. With comprehensive installation instructions,videos, and dedicated customer support, we assure you a worry-free setup experience.

What You Get:The package includes the toilet, soft-close toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, premium wax ring, floor bolts, toilet tank lid, side cover sets and installation instructions. 12-month worry-free warranty, and our life-time friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SOTOMO One-Piece Toilet, Complements Various Furniture Styles. SOTOMO K-0318DF Toilet has a smooth modern one-piece design, making it effortlessly complements various bathroom styles. With a compact design of 27.75 inches in depth, 15.4 inches in width, and 27.13 inches in height, along with an elongated seat (18.75 inches), it not only saves space but is also very comfortable for sitting. Ideal for apartment bathrooms, cozy en-suites, welcoming guest bathrooms, versatile commercial spaces, and beyond, this toilet seamlessly blends style and functionality. Elevate your bathroom aesthetics with the sophistication of SOTOMO, where innovative design meets comfort, making it the perfect choice for contemporary living.

Set Up Your Toilet with Ease and Peace of Mind One-piece toilet installation is not as difficult as people think, it has a faster installation time because no additional assembly is required. With two large openings on the side, it becomes easier for the plumber to operate. We will also provide a comprehensive manual to show the installation steps.

Simplicity in Maintenance and Cleaning One-piece toilets feature a single, molded design, making them sleeker compared to two-piece toilets. Without a device connecting the tank to the bowl, one-piece toilets are less prone to cracking and leaking, ensuring greater durability. The skirted design not only provides a higher-end look but also saves you cleaning time without any nooks and crannies.

High-Temperature Fired Ceramic Toilet The extreme high temperature resistance allows a firing temperature of approx. 2246°F thus results in a very high level of hardness. The hygienically smooth surface caramic is wear and scratch-resistant, make SOTOMO toilet easy to clean.

Elongated Toilet Seat The elongated toilet seat offers added support and comfort. Elongated bowls are considered more 'hygienic' with a larger surface area, making them easier for men and children to use with less mess. Powerful Siphon Flushing K-0318DF toilet uses powerful siphon flushing technology, utilizing the pressure difference to effectively suction away waste, effortlessly removing it with minimal noise and ensuring effective odor control. Dual Flush System You can choose between half flush and full flush based on your needs, with dual flush toilets offering greater water conservation and cost savings. 2" Fully Glazed Trapway The full glazed slick surface minimizes the chances of a clog. A 2" trapway ensures the performance of siphon flush, effectively carrying away waste.

Soft Closing Seat Experience gentle and noiseless closing every time. Prevents slamming, enhances safety, and extends the lifetime of your toilet seat. Quick Release Seat With a quick-release seat design, cleaning becomes effortless, allowing easy removal and tool-free replacement. This enhances hygiene and ensures user-friendly maintenance. Installation Tips We recommend installing the Water Supply Valve approximately 8 inches to the left or right of the center of the toilet bowl and 6 inches above the floor.（Adjustments can be made as needed, ensuring a steady water supply.) All in One Package Our products and accessories are packaged in a sturdy and stable packaging, Including the toilet, soft-close toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, premium wax ring, floor bolts, toilet tank lid, side cover sets and installation instructions.
